import axios from "axios"; import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react"; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; const ProductDetail = () => { const { product_id } = useParams(); const [productDetail, setProductDetail] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/products/${product_id}`) .then(response => { setProductDetail(response.data); }) .catch (error => { console.log("Lỗi khi gọi api detail product!", error) }); }, [product_id]); return (

) } export default ProductDetail
